TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_prahum, title = prahum, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/prahum} }

S.FORM: == prahum == Prahum ru g'nux ga zyan nqu mtswe, prraw ga mutux baq maniq.
== prahom == Prahom ro g'nox ga zyan nqo mtswe, prraw ga motox baq maniq.
